title: 2 Bed + Office, 1.5 Bath Row Home in Fishtown
description:
The house is for rent by owners. We take personal pride in its upkeep.
Open house Sunday, April 30 1 pm - 4 pm
The home features:
• 1st Floor: living room, dining area, kitchen, breakfast nook, and ½ bath
• 2nd Floor: 3 bedrooms, including one currently set up as a huge walk-in closet, and a full bath
• Central air conditioning / heating (gas, electric, and water paid by tenant)
• Kitchen with microwave, dishwasher, garbage disposal, and gas stove
• Wireless internet already hooked up
• A basement (good for storage) with a washer and dryer
• A nice-sized back yard
• Great neighbors
It's a great place to live, fun neighborhood with an awesome gastropub (Memphis Taproom), an organic nursery/urban farm with an award winning CSA (farm share) and farmers market all one block away (Greensgrow Farms). A few blocks from grocery and fitness center on Aramingo. It also has great night spots like Kraftwork, Johnny Brendas and Frankford Hall all easy walk away. It's easy to get onto 95 and quick to get just about anywhere in the city. Easy street parking. There's also public transportation a block away.
Pets allowed on a case-by-case basis.

title: HOUSE FOR RENT 3 BED 1.5 BATH
description:
This wonderfully traditional home, with all new upgrades, is just steps from South Philly's famous "Eatery Row!" An attractive colonial front is the first tip-off of what is to come! Spacious and open living room/dining room combo with refinished original hardwood flooring, and a large "eat-in" kitchen - with plenty of cabinets and food preparation space. The rear outdoor space is perfect for a private BBQ and friendly gatherings. The first floor also includes a half bath which is perfect for you and guest so that company does not have to use the main bathroom on the 2nd floor. Besides the main full bath, the 2nd level is comprised of 1 large bedroom and 2 regular sized bedrooms. A full open clean basement with cement walls, a newer water heater, laundry area w/ additional refrigerator and freezer; and plenty of room for storage.
Upgrades include:
All new window A/C units in every room
Entire house painted
All new ceiling fans and light fixtures in every room
Brand-new refrigerator and oven
TV Mount installed in living room (Fits 42"-75" TVs)
Ring security camera / flood light installed
Schedule your showing today!
Tenant is responsible for all Utilities. Security deposit due before moving in and first months rent due the day the lease begins
